sentences: Jacky Terrasson (born November 27, 1965) is a French jazz pianist and composer.
Terrasson's mother is African-American from Georgia, and his father is French.
Terrasson went to the Berklee College of Music in Boston for two semesters, then performed in clubs as a jazz pianist in Chicago and New York City.
In 1993 he won the Thelonious Monk International Jazz Piano Competition.
